name: TRENCHBRAIN
description:
.. .-.. .-.. ..- -- .. -. .- - . --- .-. .--. . .-. .. ... ....

Trenchbrain is a zombie shooter designed to use the muzzle flash horror effect used in many Hollywood films as a gameplay mechanic. In this game, this flashing muzzle effect is the one of the few light based tools you have at your disposal to illuminate the level you inhabit.

Art, Programming and Design

Alex Johansson

Music and Sounds

The wonderful Will Bedford

I've had this project sitting around for a while and wanted to hear what people thought before I considered taking development on it any further. I hope you enjoy playing the game and feel free to get in touch if you have any questions/things you'd like to see.
